name: JETBOY
description:
Jetboy is a retro supercharged pixel jetpacking shooter with a pumping metal soundtrack. Story Mode and crazy randomized Arcade Modes.

Beat the space worms, crazy jumping eyes, spinning things, weird things, space things and big bosses.

Multiple Story Mode Levels and Insane Randomized WTF Infinity Arcade mode means every play is unique.Features
  • Story Mode
  • Arcade Mode - Infinity Mode
  • Tons of Bosses, Baddies & Levels
  • Selectable characters including JetSheep
  • 10 track Metal soundtrack
  • Joystick & Keyboard control
  • Retro 4:3 aspect ratio. Like the old days.
  • Designed at 160x144 pixels
